articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: A Skin-Eating Fungal Plague Is Silently Tearing Through Wildlife Across Africa, Scientists Warn - Forbes
articles.description: Researchers used to think Africa, home to a sizable fraction of amphibian biodiversity, had largely escaped Bd, a devastating fungal infection that has wiped out hundreds of species worldwide.
articles.content: A lethal, skin-eating fungus has been rapidly spreading across African wildlife since the turn of the century, scientists warned Wednesday, shedding light on an unnoticed amphibian plague that has dr… [+4176 chars]
